headline: It’s Been a Bad Week for Crypto Stocks So Far
summary: The price of bitcoin dropped again on Tuesday, and it’s taking these crypto stocks down with it. Shares of Coinbase and Robinhood each fell more than 4% in afternoon trading. Shares of Strategy, which function as a kind of leveraged bet on Bitcoin, are down close to 8%.

headline: MetaMask Partners Ondo Finance to Integrate Tokenized US Stocks, ETFs, Commodities

headline: US brokers may charge fee from ETF managers as commission-free trading takes a toll
summary: U.S. brokerage firms and custodians may seek distribution fees from managers of exchange-traded funds, J.P. Morgan said, marking a ​possible crucial shift in the country's $13.5 trillion ETF market.  Platforms such as Robinhood attracted millions of retail investors with zero trading fees and simple mobile apps, pulling customers and trading volume away from traditional brokerages.  To combat the shift in the competitive landscape, legacy players such as Fidelity and Charles Schwab have raced ⁠to win over clients by ‌slashing trade commissions to as low as zero dollars for exchange-traded funds.

headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher As Factory Strength Supports Growth
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Tuesday, Feb, 3 2026 US stock futures are slightly higher this morning, with E mini S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 contracts up around 0.5%, as investors react to stronger US factory data and steady bond yields. The ISM Manufacturing PMI, a key scorecard for factory activity, sits at 52.6 for January 2026, which signals expanding output and potentially firmer demand for goods. At the same time, the 10 year Treasury yield around 4.27% keeps borrowing costs...
